content_parts.text: He was a Jewish scribe who was apparently an instructor at a Jewish academy, probably in Jerusalem, where he taught religion and ethics.
All true wisdom comes from the Lord
All true wisdom comes from the Lord
The book is in the tradition of Proverbs: “The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom.” Wisdom is God's gift to men.
Though profound, the teaching is not complicated, and it touches the heart.
—Jesus ben Sirach wrote his lectures down in a manuscript.
That manuscript, written in Hebrew, got very little circulation until his grandson translated it into Greek.
Then, about three centuries later, a translation was made into Syriac from the Hebrew text.
Ben Sirach is well-acquainted with the Law and the Prophets.
, wisdom comes from a blessed, joyful reverence for and knowledge of God.
